mapper.select: SELECT IDH.INFER_DETAIL_CODE, (SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM ITEMNAME WHERE ITEM_CODE = IDH.INFER_ITEM) AS INFER_ITEM, IDH.TOTAL_QUANTITY, IDH.INFER_QUANTITY, FIND_CD(IDH.INFER_TYPE) AS INFER_TYPE, IDH.INFER_IMAGE, IDH.INFER_NO, IDH.INSTORE_NO, (TO_CHAR(IH.INFER_APPLICATION_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD')) AS INFER_APPLICATION_DATE, FIND_COMPNAME(IH.CONFIRM_LOCATION) AS CONFIRM_LOCATION, IH.CONFIRM_WHETHER, (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = IH.INFER_MANAGER) AS MANAGER_NAME, IH.INFER_MANAGER, FIND_CD(IA.DISPOSAL_WHETHER) AS DISPOSAL_WHETHER, I.INSTORE_DATE FROM INFER_DETAIL_HISTORY IDH LEFT JOIN INFER_HISTORY IH ON IDH.INFER_NO = IH.INFER_NO LEFT JOIN INSTORE I ON I.INSTORE_NO = IDH.INSTORE_NO LEFT JOIN INFER_ANSWER IA ON IA.INFER_NO = IDH.INFER_NO WHERE IDH.INFER_NO = #{inferNo} ORDER BY IDH.INFER_DETAIL_CODE

SELECT FIND_CD(IA.DISPOSAL_WHETHER) AS DISPOSAL_WHETHER, IA.ANSWER, (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = IA.MANAGER) AS MANAGER, (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = IA.ANSWERER) AS ANSWERER, (TO_CHAR(IA.ANSWER_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd')) AS ANSWER_DATE, FIND_COMPNAME(IH.CONFIRM_LOCATION) AS CONFIRM_LOCATION FROM INFER_ANSWER IA LEFT JOIN INFER_HISTORY IH ON IA.INFER_NO = IH.INFER_NO WHERE IA.INFER_NO = #{inferNo}
SELECT COMPANY_NO , DIV , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_ADDRESS , COMPANY_TEL , BRN , REGION FROM COMPANY ORDER BY COMPANY_NO
